scripts.capacitor: npm run capacitor-local:pre && npx cap sync
scripts.capacitor-dev-local:pre: cross-env NODE_OPTIONS='--openssl-legacy-provider' NODE_ENV=production BASE_ENV=development CAPACITOR_ENV=local-dev node ./config/scripts/capacitor.config.js
scripts.capacitor-dev:pre: cross-env NODE_OPTIONS='--openssl-legacy-provider' NODE_ENV=production BASE_ENV=development CAPACITOR_ENV=development node ./config/scripts/capacitor.config.js
scripts.capacitor-staging:pre: cross-env NODE_OPTIONS='--openssl-legacy-provider' NODE_ENV=production BASE_ENV=staging CAPACITOR_ENV=staging node ./config/scripts/capacitor.config.js
scripts.capacitor-prod:pre: cross-env NODE_OPTIONS='--openssl-legacy-provider' NODE_ENV=production BASE_ENV=production CAPACITOR_ENV=production node ./config/scripts/capacitor.config.js
scripts.development:pre: cross-env NODE_OPTIONS='--openssl-legacy-provider' NODE_ENV=development BASE_ENV=development node server
scripts.staging:pre: cross-env NODE_OPTIONS='--openssl-legacy-provider' NODE_ENV=development BASE_ENV=development node server
scripts.production:pre: cross-env NODE_OPTIONS='--openssl-legacy-provider' NODE_ENV=production BASE_ENV=production node server
scripts.start-dev-local: npm run capacitor-dev-local:pre && npm run development:pre
scripts.start-dev: npm run capacitor-dev:pre && npm run development:pre
scripts.start-demo: npm run capacitor-staging:pre && npm run staging:pre
scripts.start-prod: npm run capacitor-prod:pre && npm run production:pre
scripts.build:dev: npm run prebuild && npm run build-dev:pre
scripts.build:demo: npm run prebuild && npm run build-staging:pre
scripts.build:prod: npm run prebuild && npm run build-prod:pre
scripts.build-app:dev: npm run build:dev && npm run capacitor-dev:pre && npm run sync
scripts.build-app:demo: npm run build:demo && npm run capacitor-staging:pre && npm run sync
scripts.build-app:prod: npm run build:prod && npm run capacitor-prod:pre && npm run sync
scripts.build-app-zip:dev: npm run build-app:dev && npm run zip-dev:pre
scripts.build-app-zip:demo: npm run build-app:demo && npm run zip-demo:pre
scripts.build-app-zip:prod: npm run build-app:prod && npm run zip-prod:pre
